endpoints.description: Retrieve the scheduled maintenance requirements for a specified vehicle using its identification number.
Create a new maintenance appointment for a specified vehicle at a chosen service center.
List all nearby authorized service centers based on the provided location.
Access the service history of a vehicle.
Add a new vehicle to the user's account for maintenance tracking.
Retrieve upcoming notifications for scheduled vehicle maintenance.
Cancel a previously scheduled maintenance appointment.
Check the availability of parts required for scheduled maintenance at a specific service center.
Reschedule or modify an existing maintenance appointment.
Remove a vehicle from the user's account, stopping maintenance tracking for it.
